name: Rufus
description: A battle-hardened veteran of the Adventure Society. He has a scar running down his left cheek.

dialogue.default: Hmph. Keep your weapon sharp and your wits sharper.
dialogue.friendly: You've got a good arm. Maybe we can spar sometime.
dialogue.hostile: Get out of my face before I make you.

image_prompt: A Human character named Rufus. A battle-hardened veteran of the Adventure Society. He has a scar running down his left cheek. Fantasy portrait.

name: Thadwick
description: An inquisitive elf with spectacles that seem to magnify his eyes a bit too much.

dialogue.default: The flow of essence... it's quite fascinating, isn't it?
dialogue.friendly: I've discovered a new resonance pattern! Would you like to see?
dialogue.hostile: Your understanding of magic is... primitive. Leave me to my studies.

image_prompt: A Elf character named Thadwick. An inquisitive elf with spectacles that seem to magnify his eyes a bit too much. Fantasy portrait.

name: Elara
description: A stoic woman in polished plate armor, bearing the crest of the Shield.

dialogue.default: The Order protects those who cannot protect themselves.
dialogue.friendly: You have a noble heart. The Order would welcome your aid.
dialogue.hostile: Your actions threaten the peace. Walk away.

image_prompt: A Human character named Elara. A stoic woman in polished plate armor, bearing the crest of the Shield. Fantasy portrait.
